songs.title: I Remember
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I remember
When you look into my eyes
You saw right through me
And I could not hide
I was exposed
Just like a child
All of my heart
You hold it in your hands
I'm yours to command
I'm yours to demand
I, I feel so humble
With you in my life
With you in my life

[Verse 2]
I remember
When I looked into your eyes
I saw a reflection of myself
And I could not lie
Out of control
Too weak to deny
All of myself
Is naked before you
But what can I do
There is nothing I can do
I feel so beautiful
With you in my life
With you in my life

[Outro]
I remember
I remember
I remember
I, ohh, ohh, ohh
With you in my life
With you in my life
